answers.answer: It.depends most of the time they induce you but most women end up having a c section

Depends on how bad. They do try blood pressure meds if your blood pressure isn't a high risk yet and they also try bed rest. If you blood pressure is too high when you get to the hospital then they'll try to induce and if its deadly high then they'll do an emergency csection.

Do you only have preeclampsia while pregnant?
Yes. Preeclampsia is a pregnancy symptom. Its when your blood pressure gets too high and starts rejecting the baby.
